text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I did, indeed! 
After all, I'm in high spirits!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There are still 2400 meters worth
of race left, and I'm determined to
Bakushin right through summer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'll show everyone how hard working I am 
during races and summer training camps, 
and I'll be a role model for them from 
head to toe!

And so began the summer training 
camp to improve our skills!
